sourcesContent:
import React, { Component } from 'react'; import './main.css'; import 'bootstrap/dist/css/bootstrap.min.css'; import {Link} from 'react-router-dom'; import { Redirect } from 'react-router'; import { MDBBtn, MDBCard, MDBCardBody, MDBCardImage, MDBCardTitle, MDBCardText, MDBCol } from 'mdbreact'; class Main extends Component { constructor(props){ super(props); this.state = { books:[] } } componentDidMount(){ this.getBooks(); } getBooks = _ => { fetch('http://localhost:4000/books') .then(res => res.json()) .then(res => this.setState({books: res.data})) .catch(err => console.error(err)) } renderBooks = ({list_id, title, edition, isbn, price,book_type,book_condition}) =>
{title} Edition: {edition}, ISBN: {isbn}
  • Book Type: {book_type}
  • Book Condition: {book_condition}
  • Price: ${price}
Contact {/*
{title}

Edition: {edition}, ISBN: {isbn}

  • Book Type: {book_type}
  • Book Condition: {book_condition}
  • Price: $ {price}
*/}
render(){ return (
    • Submit blog
      • Submit listing
      • Registration form
    • Instruction
      • For bloggers
      • For authors
    • About
      • Introduction
      • Monthly meetings
    • Contact me
      • FAQ
      • Write a message
      • FAQ
      • Write a message
      • FAQ
      • Write a message
      • FAQ
      • Write a message
{this.state.books.map(this.renderBooks)}
); } } export default Main;
